definition: fuse (for an explosive device)/electrical lead/intermediary/catalyst/(dialect) sewing needle

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
lit. to thread a needle (idiom); fig. to act as a go-between
a pull-through to thread a needle/fig. to act as go-between

sentences.english: All five-second grenade fuses will burn down in three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 所有用时五秒烧完的手榴弹引线都会在三秒内烧完。

sentences.english: Figure 7 shows the sequence for tape bonding the chip and assembling the package.
sentences.chinese: 图7所示为带状引线连接芯片和管壳装配的工艺程序。

sentences.english: Capacitor cores can be feed automatically and the lead wire will be skinned automatically, and the lenght can be set.
sentences.chinese: 电容芯子自动上料，引线自动剥皮，长度可以设定。

sentences.english: This is a glass tube. There are some feedthroughs here to allow electrodes to be potted.
sentences.chinese: 这是个玻璃管，这里有些引线，可以使电极被射击。

sentences.english: The copper alloy strip of lead frame is the fundamental material for integrate circuit.
sentences.chinese: 引线框架用铜带是集成电路的重要基础材料。

sentences.english: The resistivity temperature curves of MgB2 wires were measured by standard four-probe method.
sentences.chinese: 采用标准四引线法测定了样品的电阻温度曲线。

sentences.english: We can insert a short length of magnesium ribbon into the ignition charge to act as a fuse.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以插一短截镁条于引火剂中作引线。

sentences.english: Her sight is equal to threading a needle without glasses.
sentences.chinese: 她的视力很好，能不戴眼镜穿针引线。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for welding a lead of diode and a diode.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种二极管引线烧焊方法及二极管。

sentences.english: Rule7. All five-second grenade fuses will burn down in three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 第七，所有五秒的手榴弹引线都会在三秒内烧完。

sentences.english: C194 copper alloy is one of the representative materials of lead frame .
sentences.chinese: C194铜合金是最具代表性的引线框架材料之一。

sentences.english: Miniature size , No lead , ideal for high density SMT installation.
sentences.chinese: 体积小，无引线，适合高密度表面贴装。

sentences.english: All five-second grenade fuses will burn down in three second.
sentences.chinese: 所有号称可燃烧5秒的手榴弹引线都会在3秒内烧完。

sentences.english: The sword male sword cut off suddenly lit the fire of thunder lead to scent.
sentences.chinese: 此时剑雄忽然拔剑切断了闻道身上点燃的火雷引线。

sentences.english: The Science and Technology Association served the function of a go-between.
sentences.chinese: 科学技术协会发挥了穿针引线的作用。

sentences.english: Threading ga needle is an art in itself.
sentences.chinese: 穿针引线本身就是一种技巧。

definition: to explode/to set off an explosion/to detonate
to ignite/to light a fire/to agitate/to start an engine/ignition/fig. to stir up trouble
fuse (for explosives)/(fig.) proximate cause/the last straw
to install (water pipes, landmines etc) underground
